definition[0]: a way of speaking to someone you love
definition[1]: an informal way of speaking to a woman you do not know, which some women find offensive
definition[3]: a sweetheart deal, contract, agreement etc is unfair because it gives people who know each other well or have a lot of influence an unfair advantage
example[2]: Some executives have been taking kickbacks from suppliers and accepting sweetheart deals.
example[3]: Critics say prosecutors gave him asweetheart sentence (=a very short one) in return for evidence against his partner.
